sentences.sContent: Colin, the theory of urban imago of Kevin.
sentences.sContent_eng: Colin, the theory of urban imago of Kevin.
sentences.sCn: 凯文·林奇的“城市意象”理论；

sentences.sContent: The imago of God in MU Dan's poems was his fulcrum and balm, which was "outside the body" of the poet.
sentences.sContent_eng: The imago of God in MU Dan's poems was his fulcrum and balm, which was "outside the body" of the poet.
sentences.sCn: 穆旦诗歌里的“上帝” 意象是诗人“人身以外”的一个支点与一份安慰。

sentences.sContent: From the discussion of flowerage imagoes, this dissertation discusses the connotation of "Huahun" imago on the foundation of flowerage imagoes.
sentences.sContent_eng: From the discussion of flowerage imagoes, this dissertation discusses the connotation of "Huahun" imago on the foundation of flowerage imagoes.
sentences.sCn: 本文从讨论《红楼梦》的花意象出发，着重揭示在花意象基础上所生成的花魂意象的内涵。

trans.tranOther: an adult sexually mature insect produced after metamorphosis
